<!-- Generated by cdocs. -->
# gt

---
## `_gt_run`
### Description
Macro that execute a test declared by `_gt_test`.
### Returns: `void`
N/A
### Parameters
`fn` : The name of the function tested.
`opt_case` : The name of the test case. This parameter can be left empty.

---
## `_gt_test`
### Description
Template macro for the declaration of tests.
### Returns: `void`
N/A
### Parameters
`fn` : The name of the function tested.
`opt_case` : The name of the test case. This parameter can be left empty.

---
## `_gt_passed`
### Description
Prints that the test has passed.
### Returns: `void`
N/A
### Parameters
`void` : No parameters.

---
## `_gt_test_print`
### Description
This is a wrapper of the function `printf`. This macro displays the location where it was used, then calls printf with provided parameters. This is useful for keeping track of the location of temporary debug prints. 
### Returns: `void`
N/A
### Parameters
`const char* format` : See the parameter `format` of function `printf`.
`...` : See the parameter `format` of function `printf`.

---
## `_gt_test_int_eq`
### Description
Asserts integer equality.
### Returns: `void`
N/A
### Parameters
`long _n1` : Left integer.
`long _n2` : Right integer.

---
## `_gt_test_float_eq`
### Description
Asserts floating point equality.
### Returns: `void`
N/A
### Parameters
`double _n1` : Left floating point value.
`double _n2` : Right floating point value.

---
## `_gt_test_ptr_eq`
### Description
Asserts pointer equality.
### Returns: `void`
N/A
### Parameters
`void* _n1` : Left pointer.
`void* _n2` : Right pointer.

---
## `_gt_test_str_eq`
### Description
Asserts string equality.
### Returns: `void`
N/A
### Parameters
`const char* _n1` : Left string.
`const char* _n2` : Right string.

---
## `_gt_test_int_neq`
### Description
Asserts integer inequality.
### Returns: `void`
N/A
### Parameters
`long _n1` : Left integer.
`long _n2` : Right integer.

---

### Description

### Returns: `void`
N/A

`double _n2` : Right floating point value.

---
## `_gt_test_int_gt`
### Description
Asserts first integer greater than second integer.
### Returns: `void`
N/A
### Parameters
`long _n1` : Left integer.
`long _n2` : Right integer.

---
## `_gt_test_float_gt`
### Description
Asserts first floating point value greater than second floating point value.
### Returns: `void`
N/A
### Parameters
`double _n1` : Left floating point value.
`double _n2` : Right floating point value.

---
## `_gt_test_int_gte`
### Description
Asserts first integer greater than or equal second integer.
### Returns: `void`
N/A
### Parameters
`long _n1` : Left integer.
`long _n2` : Right integer.

---
## `_gt_test_float_gte`
### Description
Asserts first floating point value greater than or equal second floating point value.
### Returns: `void`
N/A
### Parameters
`double _n1` : Left floating point value.
`double _n2` : Right floating point value.

---

### Description
Asserts first integer lesser than second integer.
### Returns: `void`
N/A
### Parameters
`long _n1` : Left integer.
`long _n2` : Right integer.

### Returns: `void`

`double _n2` : Right floating point value.

### Returns: `void`

`long _n2` : Right integer.
